name: Map Input Device
description: Map input device (keyboard/mouse) to LXC container or VM

parameters.name: USB Bus:Device
parameters.description: USB bus and device number in format bus:device (e.g., 1:3 for /dev/bus/usb/001/003)

parameters.name: ID of the VM
parameters.description: ID of the LXC container or VM to which the USB device will be assigned

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: Optional: UID of the user in the container who should have access to the input device (LXC only). Default is 0 (root). For VMs, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: Optional: GID of the group in the container who should have access to the input device (LXC only). Default is 0 (root). For VMs, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: Mapped UID
parameters.description: Optional: The mapped UID on the host (output from setup-lxc-uid-mapping.py in template 102). If not provided, the script will calculate it. Use this when using 1:1 UID mapping instead of the standard offset.

parameters.name: Mapped GID
parameters.description: Optional: The mapped GID on the host (output from setup-lxc-uid-mapping.py in template 102). If not provided, the script will calculate it. Use this when using 1:1 UID mapping instead of the standard offset.

parameters.name: Container Device Paths
parameters.description: Optional: Comma-separated container device paths (default: auto-detect)
